articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Brazilian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Brazilian President
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of sympathy to Luiz Inacio Lula Da Silva, President of Brazil, in connection with the heavy rain that recently hit Pernambuco and Alagoas states of Brazil for several days, claiming huge human and material losses.
					Kim in the message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the President and, through him, to the people in the afflicted areas, hoping that he and his government would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster and bring the living of the people to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Croatian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Croatian President
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Ivo Josipovic, President of Croatia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed the belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop in the common interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Mozambican President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Mozambican President
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Armando Emilio Guebuza, President of Mozambique, on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished for sustained development and prosperity of friendly Mozambique, expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop by their joint efforts.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Slovenian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Slovenian FM
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday sent a message of greetings to his Slovenian counterpart Samuel Zbogar on the occasion of the national day of Slovenia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop thanks to their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Pyongyang Army-People Rally against US Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Army-People Rally against US Held
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang army-people rally against the United States took place at Kim Il Sung Square on Friday on the occasion of "June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists".
					Attending the rally were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces, power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, and working people, youth and students in the city, more than 120,000 people. The chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas compatriots were on hand.
					
					 Present on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries and staff members of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his address at the rally that after launching an armed invasion against the northern half of Korea on June 25, 1950 to destroy the DPRK in its cradle and realize their scenario for world domination the U.S. imperialists carried out the most barbaric war of aggression in the world history of wars by mobilizing more than two million troops of their aggressor forces and armies of fifteen satellite countries and the south Korean puppet army and huge quantities of war materiel. Due to the bestial atrocities of the U.S. imperialist aggressors millions of innocent Korean people were mercilessly killed, and the whole territory of the northern half of Korea alive with the drive for carving out a new life was reduced to debris in the period of the war, he noted.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the army and people of the DPRK beat back the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and their imperialist allied forces by displaying matchless bravery and popular heroism and the might of single-minded unity and thus honorably protected the sovereignty of the nation and the gains of the revolution and brought about the beginning of decline for the U.S. imperialists, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S., far from drawing a due lesson from the ignominious defeat it sustained in the last Korean War, has kept south Korea under its occupation and desperately pursued the hostile policy towards the DPRK, bringing unbearable misfortune and sufferings to the Korean nation.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, too, is working with bloodshot eyes to put international "sanctions" against the DPRK into practice over the case of the sunk warship under the manipulation of the U.S. It attempted to resume the psychological warfare against the DPRK and is busy staging large-scale DPRK-targeted war exercises, blatantly challenging the aspiration and desire of the nation for the country's peace and reunification.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that the war launched by it on June 25 ended with the victory of the Korean people on July 27 after three years.
					
					 If the U.S. and the puppet group of traitors finally ignite a war of aggression defying the repeated warnings of the DPRK, the army and people of the DPRK will never miss a chance but certainly give vent to their pent-up grudge and resentment to mercilessly wipe out the aggressors and the provocateurs.
					
					 Then followed speeches by representatives of the Korean People's Army, workers, agricultural workers and youth and students.
					
					 They stressed that the DPRK would react to the "retaliation" and "punishment" of the enemies and even their slightest provocation with Korean-style merciless punishment.
					
					 At the end of the rally there was an anti-U.S. demonstration.
					
					 The demonstrators marched along main streets, holding slogan-boards and posters. They chanted slogans reflecting hatred and resentment at the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors.

articles.title: Anti-US Rally in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Anti-US Rally in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang army-people rally against the United States was held in the DPRK today on the occasion of "June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists".
					Kim Il Sung Square, the venue of the rally, and roads adjacent to it were crowded with at least 120,000 masses of different strata determined to win in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Speeches were made at the rally by representatives of different strata.
					
					 After the rally the participants marched through main streets of the city, carrying slogan-boards and posters and raising shouts for hatred and wrath at the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors kowtowing to them.

articles.title: "Day of Struggle against US imperialists" Observed
articles.content:
"Day of Struggle against US imperialists" Observed
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in different parts of the country on the occasion of "June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists".
					 Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea held an indignation meeting and school youth and children in the capital city of Pyongyang a meeting to vow to take revenge upon the U.S. imperialists on the bank of the Taedong River where there are the monument to the sinking of the U.S. aggressor ship "General Sherman" and the U.S. imperialist armed spy ship "Pueblo." 
					
					 At the meetings speakers condemned the brutality and cruelty of the U.S. imperialists who ignited a war of aggression against the DPRK and perpetrated the most hideous massacres and destruction in the world history of wars.
					
					 People in Sinchon County of South Hwanghae Province, Kaesong and Wonsan cities, Susan-ri, Kangso District of Nampho City and other cities, counties and ris also met to roundly expose the bestial atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialist ogres. 
					
					 Workers in the fields of steel, power, coal and textile industries and agricultural workers of the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province, the Sinam Co-op Farm in Ryongchon County of North Phyongan Province and other farms held meetings to evince their unshakable will to become the fortress and shield defending leader Kim Jong Il at the risk of their lives just as the youth did in the war and valiantly struggle to wipe out the enemies by staking the honor of Juche Korea, Songun Korea. 
					
					 Working people and school youth and children in various parts of the country visited houses of class education in provinces, cities and counties.

articles.title: Int'l Meeting Supports Korean People's Cause of Justice
articles.content:
Int'l Meeting Supports Korean People's Cause of Justice 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- An international meeting of youth and students supporting the just cause of the Korean people took place at the People's Palace of Culture here on Friday as regards the lapse of ten years after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and six decades since the outbreak of the Korean War by the U.S. imperialists. 
					 Attending it were President of the WFDY Tiago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira and his party, delegations and delegates of youth and student organizations from Greece, Namibia, South Africa, Nepal, Germany, Laos, Lebanon, Syria, Sri Lanka, Senegal, India, Jordan, Spain, Vietnam, Palestine, Cuba, Cyprus, Portugal and other countries, delegates of the Latin American Continental Student Organization and the General Union of Arab Students, staff members of foreign embassies here and members of the delegation of the Korean Youth League in Japan.
					
					 Present were Secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Thae Bok, First Secretary of the C.C, the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Ri Yong Chol and officials of the league, officials concerned and youth and students.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said in his congratulatory speech that the meeting is a great encouragement to the youths and other people of the DPRK pushing ahead with the building of a thriving socialist nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people and youth will defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, fully perform their responsibility and role in the struggle for national reunification and prosperity of the country and strive to realize the human cause of independence in close unity with the progressive people and youths and students of the world, he declared.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the meeting would mark an important occasion in building up the world public opinion of condemning the reckless confrontation and war provocation moves of the U.S. and its followers who violate the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 Tiago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira said in his keynote report that he will stand on the side of the Korean people struggling for the sovereignty of the country and its peaceful reunification.
					
					 He noted that the world progressive youths are highly praising the DPRK for having waged a dynamic struggle to open the door of reunification for the past several decades under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He termed the recent case of the south Korean warship "Cheonan" sinking in the waters of the West Sea a farce cooked up by the United States to aggravate the tensions between the north and the south.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol said in his supplementary report that the reality of the Korean Peninsula more clearly reveals the true colors of the U.S. as a wrecker of global peace and security and chieftain of aggression.
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' ceaseless scheme to ignite a new war has been shattered and peace and security reliably defended on the Korean Peninsula thanks to the unique Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the progressive youth and students and people of the world would as ever extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people including the youths in the struggle to open up a new phase for the independent reunification under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting by representatives of Asian, African, European and North American and Middle East regions.
					
					 Read out at the meeting was a letter to Kim Jong Il presented by delegations and delegates of youth and student organizations from different countries and regions who participated in the international meeting and solidarity march of youth and students for support to the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 An appeal to governments, political parties and organizations of all countries was also adopted.

articles.title: Appeal of Int'l Meeting Adopted
articles.content:
Appeal of Int'l Meeting Adopted
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- An appeal to governments, political parties and organizations in different countries of the world was adopted at the International Meeting of Youth and Students Supporting the Just Cause of the Korean People held here Friday. 
					The appeal said that the participants unanimously highlighted the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity advanced by President Kim Il Sung as an invariable guideline for Korea's reunification, and highly appreciated General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is now writing a new chapter of independent reunification with the Songun politics.
					
					 They expressed the belief that the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration is the shortcut to the ultimate end of the history of north-south confrontation and to reunification of Korea, the appeal noted, adding:
					
					 The participants call upon the governments, political parties and organizations in different countries of the world to launch broader movement supporting the independent reunification of Korea throughout the world, to launch more dynamic international solidarity movement to give positive support to the June 15 joint declaration as the most above-board reunification programme and ensure its uninterrupted implementation, to strongly condemn the war moves of the U.S., Japan and the south Korean authorities as a threat to peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world and arouse the international public opinion demanding peace on the Korean Peninsula and to intensify the international solidarity movement to frustrate the reckless confrontation moves against the DPRK triggered off by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities with the fabrication of the sinking of warship "Cheonan", the biggest of all farce and charade.
					
					 The appeal expressed the firm belief that all governments, political parties and organizations and peace-loving people in different countries of the world will voice stronger support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just efforts to frustrate the war moves of the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Int'l Solidarity March Held
articles.content:
Int'l Solidarity March Held
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- An international solidarity march of youth and students in support of the just cause of the Korean people took place here on Friday on the occasion of the lapse of six decades since the start of the Korean War by the U.S. imperialists.
					 It was participated in by President of the World Federation of Democratic Youth Tiago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira and his party, delegations and delegates of youth and student organizations from Greece, Namibia, South Africa, Nepal, Germany, Laos, Lebanon, Syria, Sri Lanka, Senegal, India, Jordan, Spain, Vietnam, Palestine, Cuba, Cyprus, Portugal and other countries, delegates of the Latin American Continental Student Organization and the General Union of Arab Students.
					
					 Among its participants were officials of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League including its First Secretary Ri Yong Chol, youth and students and members of the delegation of the Korean Youth League in Japan.
					
					 The president of the WFDY said in his speech made prior to the kick-off of the march that the march would contribute to condemning the U.S. and south Korean conservative authorities' conspiratorial campaign against the DPRK and lifting higher the voices supporting the struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 The WFDY and the world progressive youth and students would stand by the youth and other people of the DPRK and extend positive support and encouragement to them in their struggle to check and frustrate the U.S. and the south Korean conservative authorities' escalated confrontation and war moves against the DPRK and achieve the reunification of the country under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration in the future, too, he stressed.
					
					 Its participants moved towards the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower, holding placards reading "Smash the U.S. nuclear confrontation against the DPRK!", "Smash the imperialists' aggressive war maneuvers and safeguard peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world!" and others.

articles.title: Letter from Participants in Int'l Meeting and Solidarity March
articles.content:
Letter from Participants in Int'l Meeting and Solidarity March
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a letter on Friday by delegations and delegates of youth and students organizations of different countries and regions of the world that participated in the international meeting and solidarity march of youth and students supporting the just cause of the Korean people.
					 The letter said: 
					
					 The current solidarity activities which coincide with the unprecedented escalation of conspiratorial moves of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities against the DPRK have served as an important occasion to give the progressive youth and students of the world a correct understanding of who truly wants justice and peace on the Korean Peninsula and who incites war and confrontation to plunge it into the catastrophe of a nuclear war.
					
					 The letter noted that through the international meeting of youth and students and the solidarity march, they deepened belief and understanding of the validity of the Three Charters for Korea's reunification advanced by President Kim Il Sung and the vitality of the June 15 joint declaration, the fruition of the wisdom and broadmindedness of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the DPRK under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il is winning one victory after another despite all forms of challenges and persistent attempts of the U.S. and its followers to isolate and stifle it, the letter noted that the DPRK gives boundless encouragement to the progressive people of the world in their struggle for global independence and peace against aggression and war as it is a castle for the cause of independence.
					
					 We will continue to launch different forms of consistent solidarity movement to denounce the hostile policy of the U.S.-led reactionary forces of the world and support all peace-loving efforts of the DPRK government, it said, and continued: 
					
					 We will as always extend strong encouragement to the Korean youth and other people in their efforts for independent national reunification and prosperity.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits War Museum
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits War Museum
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum Friday on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the U.S. imperialists unleashed the Korean War and committed all sorts of shuddering murders, the members of the corps looked round data and pieces of evidence exhibited there.
					
					 After the visit, Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the corps, charged that the U.S. imperialists inflicted great calamities upon the Korean people in three years of the war.
					
					 He hoped that the army and people of the DPRK would register greater successes in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Doctorates Conferred on Korean Scholars in China
articles.content:
Doctorates Conferred on Korean Scholars in China
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A doctorate of linguistics of the DPRK went to Sim Hyon Suk, teacher of the Korean Language Faculty of Yanbian University of China, and a doctorate of history was conferred on Sim Yong Suk, teacher of the Korean Minority School of Education in Liaoning Province of China.
					 Sim Hyon Suk deepened study of the linguistic theory of the Korean compound words arising in the practical use of the Korean vocabularies, thus contributing to the education of the Korean language and researches into it. Sim Yong Suk unearthed and proved the data on the migration of Korean people to Northeast China from the 17th century to the period before the defeat of the Japanese imperialists and comprehensively studied and systematized them.
					
					 A ceremony of awarding the doctorates took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: New Inventions for Promotion of Health
articles.content:
New Inventions for Promotion of Health
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Kongang Joint Venture Company of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has made new inventions to promote public health. 
					 Among them is Lumbrokinase, a capsulated medicine efficacious for thrombosis.  
					
					 It is manufactured with thromboclasis zyme extracted from earthworm (Eisenia foetida) by a new technology. 
					
					 It is also good for prevention and treatment of such diseases as cerebral thrombosis, brain infarction, myocardial infraction, spontaneous gangrene and vertebroarterial circulatory failure.
					
					 The company has also developed different laser treatment apparatuses, including multifunction laser therapy device, effective for such diseases as piles, prostatitis and woman's disease.    
					
					 Their inventions were well received in the 13th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair held in last May.

articles.title: New Model of Digital Electronic Piano Manufactured
articles.content:
New Model of Digital Electronic Piano Manufactured
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Music and Video Electronics Joint Venture Company of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has manufactured a digital electronic piano, Sobaeksu-2.
					 The piano is little different from ordinary one in making beautiful sounds and pressing keys.
					
					 President of the company Nam Hyok Chol, 38, told KCNA that the new model has much superiority to Sobaeksu-1.
					
					 It, with three pedals and various functions necessary for performance, can not only create and edit music with the help of computer but also select tone quality and rhythm freely.
					
					 The piano has 87 sorts of rhythms, including fourteen main sorts of Korean rhythms, and 150 kinds of tones.
					
					 It also has "Where Are You, Dear General?", "Push Back Frontiers of the Latest Science", "My Wife" and other Korean and world famous tunes in store.

articles.title: JIK Slams US Criminal Abuse of UN for Provocation of Korean War
articles.content:
JIK Slams US Criminal Abuse of UN for Provocation of Korean War
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Jurists Institute of Korea released a white paper Friday disclosing the U.S. criminal and illegal abuse of the UN to provoke the Korean War of aggression.
					 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea finally referred the case of warship "Cheonan" to the UN, thus kicking off a renewed racket for tightening "the international sanctions" against the DPRK, the white paper says, citing facts to disclose the crimes the U.S. and traitor Syngman Rhee committed by justifying their launch of the Korean War of aggression by abusing the UN six decades ago.
					
					 The U.S. made careful preparations to launch the war under the name of the UN, the white paper says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. had already organized a "drafting group" at the State Department and let it work out a "basic document" and "resolution" to be presented to the UN with the calculation that a complaint that the "north Korean army committed armed attack" was made to the UN, in a purpose to legally hurl its forces and troops of its satellite countries into the Korean War.
					
					 After provoking the Korean War under a carefully worked out plan, the U.S. abused the UN in a bid to falsify the truth about its start of the war and justify its undisguised armed intervention.
					
					 No sooner had the war broke out in Korea on June 25, 1950 than the then U.S. representative at the UN briefed the UN secretary general in New York on a report presented by officials of the U.S. State Department to the effect that "north Korea made a war declaration". He urged the UN chief to immediately call a UNSC meeting at the urgent request of the U.S. government.
					
					 An emergency UNSC meeting was thus held on June 25 due to the gimmick of the U.S. and its brigandish demand. UNSC "Resolution 82" was thus railroaded. This U.S.-sponsored "resolution" branded the DPRK as an "aggressor" on the basis of its lie that "north Korea made an armed attack," thus shifting the blame for the outbreak of the war on to the DPRK.
					
					 Another UNSC meeting held on June 27 passed UNSC "Resolution 83" under the U.S. pressure. This resolution allowed UN member nations (the U.S. and its allies) to launch armed intervention in Korea.
					
					 This resolution was, however, nothing but a fig leaf to cover up the U.S. aggression of Korea with the name of UN in view of the time of its adoption.
					
					 On June 25, before the adoption of "Resolution 83", the U.S. let its Japan-based 68th and 339th combat flying corps as well as the 25th corps of fighter bombers of the 5th air force make sorties over Korea 163 times. They perpetrated saturation bombing on the areas of the northern half of Korea from daytime of June 26 and the U.S. 7th fleet launched military operations in the waters off Korea on that day.
					
					 For the purpose of hurling more troops of its satellites into Korea the U.S. got the UNSC adopted its "Resolution 84" on July 7 calling for the organization of the U.S.-led "UN Forces".
					
					 This brought the number of the countries which sent their troops to the above-said Korean war of aggression to 15.
					
					 Disclosing the injustice of the UNSC "resolutions" cooked up according to the U.S. scenario, the white paper says:
					
					 First, they were adopted without examining the specific facts about the dispute.
					
					 "Resolution 82" was worked out on the basis of a report presented to the UN secretary general by the then U.S. Ambassador to south Korea Muccio and a report of the "UN Commission on Korea" put forward by the U.S. and others. These were cooked up on the basis of the U.S. inventions or of what they obtained from traitor Syngman Rhee.
					
					 The same can be said of "Resolution 83". The UNSC adopted it with neither examination nor confirmation of four reports which the "UN Commission on Korea" worked out in the morning on June 26 at the U.S. instruction.
					
					 Second, those resolutions were adopted quite contrary to the requirement of the UN Charter which calls for letting the parties involved in the dispute participate in the discussion.
					
					 The U.S. deliberately turned down just requests to invite the representative of the DPRK, a party to the dispute, to the negotiations even though such requests were made whenever there were discussions on the DPRK. It manipulated negotiators to allow only the south Korean puppet representatives to participate in the debate.
					
					 Third, those resolutions were adopted in wanton violation of Paragraph 3 of Article 27 of the UN Charter stipulating the voting procedures of the UNSC which say that any resolution can be passed with the approval of seven member nations (at that time) including the yes votes of all the five permanent members.
					
					 The UNSC was not functioning properly at that time as the UN had pro-U.S. tendency and the former Soviet Union, one of the five permanent member nations, was not present there. 
					
					 Fourth, those resolutions were cooked up in defiance of the requirements of the UN Charter concerning the UN Forces.
					
					 The U.S. breached norms of the UN Charter concerning the organization of the UN Forces.
					
					 The U.S. and its 15 satellite countries dispatched their troops to the Korean front before concluding any special agreement in line with Article 43 of the charter.
					
					 The U.S. also wrested all rights to command the "UN Forces" in violation of the system of supervision of the UN Forces and the principles of its activities.
					
					 Clark, UN forces commander toward the end of the Korean War, confessed in March 1967 that he was "UN Forces commander" in Korea but he did not remember what instruction he got from the UN during the war.
					
					 This proves that the "UN Forces" and the "UN Forces Command" organized by the U.S. by abusing the UN had nothing to do with the UN. That was why at the 28th UN General Assembly representatives of many countries charged that the U.S. fabricated "Resolution 84" by abusing the UN and the sham forces which were not responsible for their actions before the UNSC were preposterously called the "UN Forces".
					
					 The injustice of the UNSC "resolutions" related to the Korean War, which were concocted according to the U.S. scenario, were brought to light with the UNSC "resolution 90" adopted later.
					
					 On Jan. 31, 1951 after the former Soviet Union participated in the activities of the UNSC, it adopted "Resolution 90" retracting from its agenda the Korean War-related "complaint about the aggression against the Republic of Korea" which was presented by the U.S. on June 25, 1950. The Korean issue had not been tabled since then.
					
					 The adoption of "Resolution 90" meant, in the final analysis, the UNSC's admittance of the injustice of all "resolutions" related to the Korean War.
					
					 All facts prove that the U.S. abuse of the UN for the war of aggression against the DPRK was a very serious breach of international law as it had no legal validity.

articles.title: Papers Observe Lapse of Six Decades since US Provocation of Korean War
articles.content:
Papers Observe Lapse of Six Decades since US Provocation of Korean War
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Friday carry editorials in connection with the lapse of six decades since the U.S. imperialists provoked the Korean War. 
					 More than half a century has passed since the ceasefire of the Korean war ignited by the U.S. imperialists on June 25, 1950 by instigating the south Korean puppet forces but the Korean nation has been exposed to the constant danger of war and the peace on the Korean Peninsula is always threatened due to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' vicious moves to provoke a new war, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group has persisted in its moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen, refusing to implement the June 15 joint declaration backed by outsiders from the outset of its office. It orchestrated a hideous farce called warship "Cheonan" case in collusion and tie-up with the U.S.
					
					 The moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad pushed the inter-Korean relations to such a touch and go situation which prevailed six decades ago and are bringing a real war to the Korean Peninsula. This grave situation calls upon all the Koreans to come out in a nation-wide struggle to resolutely check and meet the challenge of aggressors at home and abroad and protect the security of the nation and the peace of the country.
					
					 The basic way of defusing the danger of a war to the peninsula and achieving independent reunification is to preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration, and the October 4 declaration, the supreme programmes of the nation for reunification.
					
					 The situation remains grave and manifold difficulties are lying in the way of the Koreans. But they are convinced of victory in the just patriotic cause of achieving the peace and the reunification of the country.
					
					 No aggressor forces can hold in check the struggle of the Korean people to protect the national dignity and sovereignty, preserve the peace on the peninsula and the security of the nation and achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the uplifted banner of the great Songun.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the compatriots in the north, the south and abroad to defend the peace on the peninsula and hasten independent reunification by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Fascist Suppression under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations issued statements on June 22 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its fascist suppression.
					 The Emergency Committee of Measures against the Suppression under the Pretext of Security of "the Council for Promoting the Reunification of Our Nation by Federal Formula" in a statement recalled that on June 14 the police searched offices of the council and houses of its leading members and confiscated computers and various kinds of books and documents on charges of violation of the "National Security Law" and arrested two of them. This incident is a crackdown upon the reunification movement organizations opposed to the treacherous policy of the Lee Myung Bak regime, it noted.
					
					 It stressed that they would stage to the last the struggle to get the NSL abolished and the U.S. troops withdrawn from south Korea and the movement to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification according to the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 The Council of Professors for Democracy, too, in a solidarity statement signed by at least 290 university professors and researchers in denunciation of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' suppression of the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society recalled that on June 11 the citizens' solidarity sent a letter to the UNSC as regards the case of the "Cheonan" sinking. It accused the conservative forces of going on the rampage, chiding and attacking the citizens' solidarity while talking about "state interests".
					
					 The statement demanded the conservative forces stop at once the unreasonable attack on the citizens' solidarity and the "government" stop encouraging their rowdyism but opt for probing the truth about the case of the warship sinking. 
					
					 The Headquarters of the Movement for the Withdrawal of the U.S. Forces in a statement condemned the Seoul District Prosecutor's Office for frantically searching Internet homepage operated by the organization on charges of violation of the NSL.
					
					 The statement said that the repressive racket was a retaliation against the organization which has waged a strenuous movement for getting the U.S. troops withdrawn from south Korea and strongly opposed the farce of the Lee Myung Bak regime, which cooked up the case of the warship sinking.

articles.title: S. Korean Groups Blasts War Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Groups Blasts War Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Preparatory Committee for the Anti-War  Peace Solidarity, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic and public organizations of various circles of south Korea called a press conference in front of the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade in Seoul on June 22 at which they denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its reckless moves for a war against the DPRK.
					 A press release was read out at the press conference. It recalled that the Lee Myung Bak "government" decided to stage a maritime intercepting and inspection maneuver within the framework of PSI in the waters around Pusan Port in October and push forward a proposal for formally partaking of OEG, a core organization of PSI, in November under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case.
					
					 "Intercepting", a main principle of actions of PSI, means "checking actions of the other party through bombardment and bombing", it said, adding that this is violations of international law and the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 The present "government" is contemplating positively participating in PSI on its own initiative, the press release noted, stressing that this is a very provocative and bellicose step to increase the possibility of military conflict between the south and the north as it undisguisedly revealed its specific scenario to implement its military step against the north.
					
					 It said that the Lee Myung Bak "government", driven into a tight corner internally and externally for fabricating the "Cheonan" case, seeks a way-out in increasing the danger of war through military tension and conflicts between the south and the north.
					
					 It strongly demanded the authorities stop at once the hostile policy toward the north, a policy seriously threatening the peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Month of Int'l Solidarity with Korean People Opens in Cuba
articles.content:
Month of Int'l Solidarity with Korean People Opens in Cuba
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people was held in Cuba on June 18.
					 Present there were officials of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the National Committee for Defending Revolution of Cuba and other people. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of the DPRK embassy there.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, referred to the fact that the army and people of the DPRK beat back the U.S. imperialists and won a brilliant victory in the three-year-long Fatherland Liberation War under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He accused the U.S. of watching for a chance to invade the DPRK again by keeping huge aggression forces in south Korea and mobilizing all type up-to-date military equipment, far from drawing a lesson from their bitter defeat in the Korean war.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il, true to the behest of Kim Il Sung, has wisely steered the struggle of the Korean people to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, smashing every move of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges for aggression, he said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers fabricated the case of sunk warship "Cheonan," driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war, but they can never bring the Korean people to their keens.
					
					 He affirmed that the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification would positively support the Korean people in their heroic struggle in the future, too.

articles.title: US Urged to Conclude Peace Treaty by Polish Party Leader
articles.content:
US Urged to Conclude Peace Treaty by Polish Party Leader
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Juzef Lachut, chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, made public a statement on June 18 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The Korean people defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country in the war and the U.S. had no other choice but to conclude the Armistice Agreement with the young DPRK, he noted, and went on:
					
					 After the conclusion of the AA the DPRK urged the U.S. on several occasions to replace the AA with a peace treaty while pushing ahead with the peaceful economic construction.
					
					 But the U.S. and its follower, the south Korean authorities, responded to it with the moves to provoke a new war.
					
					 Many years have passed since the end of the Cold War but the state of cease-fire lasts more than half a century and the danger of war still remains in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. has persisted in the policy of nuclear blackmail against the DPRK up to now.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants peace and co-prosperity it should sit face to face with the DPRK to discuss the arising issues in a candid manner and conclude a peace treaty with it.
					
					 The validity of the line and policy of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Jong Il will be strikingly demonstrated once again in achieving the peace of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Website Opened to Study Songun Politics in Malta
articles.content:
Website Opened to Study Songun Politics in Malta
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of Juche Philosophy and Songun Politics of Malta opened its Internet homepage on June 19 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The secretary general of the group referred to the background against which the homepage was opened. He stressed that the group would give wide publicity to the Juche idea and the Songun idea and the reality of the DPRK winning victory after victory.

articles.title: Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Various Countries
articles.content:
Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Various Countries
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings for solidarity with the Korean people were held in Norway, Denmark and Bangladesh on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle on June 14 and 15.
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Svend Hakon Yagoshen, chairman of the Communist Party of Norway, recalled that the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea cooked up the case of the sunk warship "Cheonan" in collusion with the U.S. and cried out for "retaliation" and "sanctions" over the so-called "military provocation," groundlessly linking the case with the DPRK, and has gone so frantic in its moves against the DPRK that it referred the case to the UNSC.
					
					 It merits a serious attention that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are kicking up such noisy campaign against DPRK after fabricating the said case, he charged.
					
					Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, said that the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was a historic event in which an end was put to the tragedy of national division and all the Korean people ushered in a new era of independent and peaceful reunification through reconciliation and cooperation in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 He demanded the U.S. withdraw at once its armed forces and nuclear weapons from south Korea and immediately respond to the DPRK proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 Speakers at a seminar in Bangladesh proposed naming June 15th, the day of the publication of the historic north-south joint declaration, "day of solidarity with the Korean people" and a statement was made public at a meeting in Norway.
					
					A message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting in Denmark.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Marked in Various Countries
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Seminars and film shows were held in Democratic Congo, Uganda and Ethiopia between June 14 and 17 to mark the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo said at a seminar that toward the close of the last century the Korean people had to make the "Arduous March" and the forced march due to the collapse of socialism in Eastern European countries, the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK, consecutive years of natural disasters and other causes, but they reliably defended socialism, braving the manifold hardships under the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo pointed out that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique are now intensifying the moves to stifle the DPRK as never before after orchestrating the warship "Cheonan" case. If the aggressors dare to provoke a new war in the Korean Peninsula they would suffer a shameful defeat from the DPRK which formed a harmonious whole of the leader, the Party and the masses and built its powerful defence capability, he stressed.
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said at a seminar that Kim Jong Il has paid deep attention to the youth movement and wisely led the Korean youths to perform feats in building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "the Tower of the Juche Idea", "Night of Pyongyang" and "Reply of Korea".
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in Democratic Congo.
					
					 Meanwhile a seminar and a film show were held in Egypt and film shows in France, Russia and Nepal on June 8 and 9 to mark the 46th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK and the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Russia
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia brought out in booklet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism".
					 This work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the ideas that ideological work should be regarded as most important and given priority over everything else to successfully accomplish socialism, the basic task of ideological work is to colour the whole of society with socialist ideology and ideological work must be carried out in accordance with principles and methods which meet the intrinsic requirements of socialism.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work was held at the Golos Edinstva Newspaper office on June 18.

articles.title: AJC revela abuso de ONU por EE.UU. durante la pasada guerra coreana
articles.content:
AJC revela abuso de ONU por EE.UU. durante la pasada guerra coreana
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Juristas de Corea hizo publica el dia 25 una carta blanca para revelar lo ilegal del crimen de EE.UU. de haber abusado de la ONU para justificar y participar en la guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desatada hace 60 anos.
					Hoy dia, EE.UU. y la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak arman otro alboroto de "sancion internacional" anti-RPDC al remitir por fin a la ONU el incidente del hundimiento del buque de guerra surcoreano "Cheonan", senala la nota y revela con los siguientes datos las maniobras criminales de EE.UU. y el traidor Syngman Rhee que hace ahora 60 anos, han malempleado el nombre de la ONU en la guerra contra la RPDC:
					
					  Tras completar los preparativos detallados para involucrar legitimamente en la guerra coreana las tropas de EE.UU. y los paises satelites al remitir a la ONU el problema del supuesto "ataque armado del ejercito norcoreano", EE.UU. instauro en el Departamento de Estado el "grupo de preparacion del documento" para que elaborara el "documento basico" y el "proyecto de resolucion" a ser presentados en la ONU.
					
					   Luego de provocar la guerra coreana segun el plan elaborado concretamente, EE.UU. abuso de la insignia de la ONU para justificar su abierta intervencion armada tergiversando la verdad. 
					
					  Tan pronto como fuera desatada la guerra en Corea el 25 de junio de 1950, el representante estadounidense ante la ONU leyo en Nueva York al secretario general de la ONU el informe de que "el Norte de Corea hizo la 'declaracion de guerra'", el cual fue elaborado por los funcionarios del Departamento de Estado, y le impuso la "convocacion inmediata de la reunion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU" a "peticion urgente del gobierno norteamericano".
					
					  De esta manera, el 25 de junio de aquel ano, fue realizada la reunion urgente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. En esta ocasion, fue inventada la mentira de "ataque armado del Norte" y tildada la RPDC de "provocadora". Por consiguiente, fue aprobado forzadamente el "proyecto de resolucion" de EE.UU., que imputaba a la RPDC la responsabilidad del estallido de la guerra, como la "resolucion" no. 82 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					  En la otra reunion del Consejo de Seguridad, sesionada dos dias mas tarde, fue aprobada la "resolucion" no. 83 que por la presion de EE.UU., permitia la intervencion armada de los "miembros de la ONU" (EE.UU. y sus satelites) en la guerra coreana. 
					
					Pero, si se toma en cuenta que la agresion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC fue iniciada ya antes de la aprobacion de la "resolucion" no. 83, esto no paso de ser un procedimiento para defender al imperio a nombre de la ONU.
					
					Especificamente, el 25 de junio, dos dias antes de aprobada esa "resolucion", EE.UU. lanzo en 163 ocasiones al frente coreano las aviaciones no.68 y no.339 y la aviacion de cazabombarderos no.25 de la 5a fuerza aerea norteamericana estacionadas en Japon. Y desde la tarde del 26 de junio, la aviacion norteamericana bombardeo intensamente la extension territorial de la RPDC mientras la 7a flota norteamericana inicio el mismo dia las operaciones militares en las aguas maritimas de Corea. 
					
					Para introducir a mucho mas efectivos de los paises satelites en la guerra coreana, EE.UU. volvio a fabricar el 7 de julio, por conducto del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, la "resolucion" no. 84 de organizar las "fuerzas de las Naciones Unidas" lideradas por las tropas norteamericanas. 
					
					Asi que en esta guerra de agresion contra la RPDC se incorporaron hasta las fuerzas armadas de 15 paises seguidores de EE.UU.
					
					La injusticia de las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, trazadas segun el guion de EE.UU., reside en los siguientes puntos:
					
					Primero, esas "resoluciones" fueron fabricadas sin investigar los detalles del conflicto. 
					
					El informe del embajador norteamericano en el Sur de Corea, Muccio, enviado al secretario general de la ONU en el momento de aprobacion de la "resolucion" no.82, y el reporte de la "Comision de la ONU para Corea", etc. fueron inventados por EE.UU. o se basaron en los datos brindados por el traidor Syngman Rhee.
					
					En cuanto a la "resolucion" no.83, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la aprobo sin averiguar ni confirmar 4 informes inventados el dia 26 en unos instantes por la "Comision de la ONU para Corea" segun el mandato de EE.UU.
					
					Segundo, las "resoluciones" fueron inventadas desestimando el articulo de la Carta de la ONU que demanda la participacion de los paises partes del conflicto en el debate del problema. 
					
					Aunque se presentaba en cada reunion la opinion justa de invitar al representante de la RPDC, parte directa del conflicto,  y negociar con el, EE.UU. la descarto intencionalmente promoviendo la autorizacion de la presencia solo de los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Tercero, las "resoluciones" fueron fabricadas violando flagrantemente la clausula 3 del articulo 27 de la Carta de la ONU sobre el procedimiento de votacion del Consejo de Seguridad, segun el cual una "resolucion" sera valida si obtiene el visto bueno de los 7 paises miembros del Consejo de Seguridad (membresia de aquel entonces) incluyendo la aprobacion unanime de los 5 miembros permanentes. 
					
					En aquellos momentos, estaba paralizado el funcionamiento del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU debido a la tendencia servil a EE.UU. de la ONU y a la ausencia del delegado de la ex URSS, miembro permanente.
					
					Cuarto, las "resoluciones" fueron fraguadas despreciando la demanda de la Carta de la ONU sobre las fuerzas armadas de la ONU. 
					
					EE.UU. violo los reglamentos de la Carta de la ONU sobre la organizacion de las fuerzas de Naciones Unidas. 
					
					EE.UU. y los 15 paises satelites enviaron al frente coreano sus tropas sin aprobar el convenio especial que exige el articulo 43 de la Carta de la ONU. 
					
					Ademas, EE.UU. tomo el mando directo de las "fuerzas de Naciones Unidas", a contrapelo del sistema de administracion y los principios de actividades de las "fuerzas de Naciones Unidas". 
					
					Clark, quien era "comandante de las fuerzas de Naciones Unidas" en el ultimo periodo de la guerra coreana, confeso en marzo de 1967 como sigue: "aunque yo era 'comandante de las fuerzas de Naciones Unidas' estacionadas en Corea, no me acuerdo que indicaciones he recibido durante la guerra desde esa organizacion multinacional". 
					
					Esto muestra que las "fuerzas de Naciones Unidas" y su "comandancia", creadas por EE.UU. abusando del nombre de la ONU, no tenian relacion alguna con esta organizacion. 
					
					En el 28o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, los representantes de muchos paises revelaron que EE.UU. invento la "resolucion" no. 84 a nombre de la ONU y llama absurdamente como "fuerzas de Naciones Unidas" al ejercito falso que no se compromete al Consejo de Seguridad. 
					
					La injusticia de tales "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad quedo revelada mas claramente cuando fue aprobada posteriormente la resolucion no. 90.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU aprobo esta ultima resolucion el 31 de enero de 1951, o sea, despues de que la ex URSS tomo parte en las actividades del Consejo de Seguridad.
					
					Al aprobarla, el Consejo de Seguridad elimino de su agenda el punto de debate "Acusacion por la agresion contra la Republica de Corea", presentado el 25 de junio de 1950 por EE.UU., y no debatio desde entonces el problema coreano.
					
					Esto significa que el mismo Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU reconocio la injusticia de todas sus anteriores "resoluciones" sobre la guerra coreana. 
					
					Si se toma en cuenta estos hechos, el tejemaneje de EE.UU. de haber abusado de la insignia de la ONU durante la guerra coreana resulta evidentemente ilegal y violador del derecho internacional.

articles.title: Publicado memorando de ATCC con motivo de 60o aniversario de Guerra
articles.content:
Publicado memorando de ATCC con motivo de 60o aniversario de guerra
						
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario del estallido de la pasada guerra coreana desatada por los imperialistas norteamericanos con la ambicion de dominar el mundo entero, la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea hizo publico el dia 24 un memorandum cuyo texto resumido sigue:
					Resulta imperioso revelar la verdad de la provocacion de la guerra de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por parte de los imperialistas norteamericanos, puesto que ellos tergiversan hasta hoy la verdad de la historia y actuan siniestramente para imputar su responsabilidad a la RPDC con el fin de encubrir su naturaleza de provocador de guerra y agresor. 
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos ocuparon el territorio surcoreano tras inventar el proyecto de division de Corea en el paralelo norte 38o.
					
					En agosto de 1945, informado del aviso de Japon de capitular ante las fuerzas aliadas aceptando el Acuerdo de Potsdam, EE.UU. comenzo a idear "las soluciones practicas" con el objetivo de apoderarse de la mitad del territorio coreano.
					
					Segun el guion del entonces presidente estadounidense Truman, fue elaborado el proyecto de repartir mitad y mitad entre la ex URSS y EE.UU. el territorio coreano, entregado por el rendido ejercito japones, tomando por linea divisoria el paralelo norte 38o.
					
					Luego, EE.UU. paso a las acciones para ocupar el territorio surcoreano.
					
					En la reunion de la Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU., sostenida el 13 de agosto de 1945, los imperialistas norteamericanos ordenaron al comandante de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Extremo Oriente, MacArthur, recibir la capitulacion del ejercito japones en el Sur de Corea y otras zonas responsabilizadas por EE.UU. MacArthur mando al jefe del 24o cuerpo de las tropas norteamericanas recibir la nota de capitulacion del ejercito japones y ocupar y dominar el Sur de Corea como representante de EE.UU. (Fuente: paginas 25 y 26 del libro norteamericano "Fuerzas terrestres norteamericanas en la guerra coreana" publicado en 1972)
					
					El 4 de septiembre de 1945, la avanzada del 24o cuerpo de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas arribo al aeropuerto de Kimpho y desde el 8 de septiembre hasta mediados de octubre, desembarco sin derrame de sangre en Inchon, Pusan y Mokpho el grueso del cuerpo. 
					
					Los siguientes datos revelan los preparativos militares de los imperialistas norteamericanos para desatar la guerra coreana. 
					
					Despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, los imperialistas norteamericanos persiguieron abiertamente la estrategia de hegemonia mundial y para este fin, estudiaron y completaron el plan de la nueva guerra mundial incluso la guerra coreana. 
					
					A traves de los grupos como "G-2" y "G-3", organizados  en la comandancia de MacArthur, estudiaron y trazaron durante varios anos los "planes A, B, C" suponiendo la toma de Corea, Manchuria y Siberia.
					
					Los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos elaboraron el plan de accion militar para el "ataque al Norte" en virtud del plan "A".
					
					A eso de julio de 1949, segun la orden de MacArthur, el "gobierno" surcoreano completo los preparativos para invadir a la RPDC. (Tomo I del libro sovietico "Guerra coreana" impreso en 1959, pagina 64-65)
					
					Los preparativos de ataque del titere Syngman Rhee se acabaron por fin en mayo de 1950 y se completo el plan de operaciones militares. (libro estadounidense "?Quien provoco la guerra coreana?" de version japonesa, pagina 165) 
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos trazaron el plan supersecreto "NSC-68" reflejando su estrategia de hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Se trataba de la provocacion de la guerra coreana ese plan trazado y acordado en el Departamento de Defensa y la sede de la Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor, segun la indicacion de Truman dada en enero de 1950, y aprobado el 2 de abril en la reunion del consejo de seguridad nacional de EE.UU. (New York Times, el 13 de abril de 1964)
					
					Como parte de los preparativos de guerra de agresion, los imperialistas norteamericanos procedieron a la creacion del ejercito titere surcoreano. 
					
					Con el fin de asegurar la "superioridad de 10 veces" que el ejercito norcoreano, organizaron y ampliaron de manera escalonada el ejercito titere surcoreano, lo educaron y entrenaron al estilo norteamericano y tomaron el mando sobre el.
					
					Segun la "teoria de la guerra de segunda etapa", estructuraron en formacion de ataque las tropas agresoras planeando iniciar la guerra con el ejercito titere surcoreano y ampliarla incorporando a las tropas norteamericanas.
					
					En visperas de la guerra coreana, las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Extremo Oriente estaban compuestas por las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas bajo el mando unificado de su comandante. 
					
					Ademas, EE.UU. cometio incesantes provocaciones militares contra la RPDC y recurrio al engano y camuflaje para alcanzar el efecto sorpresivo de la guerra coreana e imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC.
					
					  Durante 3 anos y medio, desde 1947 hasta el inicio de la guerra, el ejercito titere surcoreano perpetro en mas de 5 mil 150 ocasiones la provocacion militar contra RPDC a lo largo del paralelo 38o.
					
					  Fue EE.UU. el que organizo y dirigio directamente esas acciones militares.
					
					  La guerra coreana no es el resultado del choque accidental ocurrido inesperadamente a la madrugada del 25 de junio de 1950. Durante varios anos antes del estallido de la guerra, se producian frecuentemente los choques entre ambas partes de la Peninsula Coreana que se hicieron mas graves en 1949 por la presion de Seul.  Algunos expertos en el problema coreano piensan que la guerra fue iniciada practicamente en aquel ano. (libro estadounidense "Guerra coreana; pregunta sin respuesta", pagina 5).
					
					En el momento del estallido de la guerra coreana, los imperialistas norteamericanos orquestaron un drama como si no estuvieran en sus puestos para el  "descanso del fin de semana" o realizaran acciones enajenadas de la combatividad. (libro estadounidense "Enigma de MacArthur", version japonesa, pagina 257)
					
					  Segun el guion de EE.UU., Syngman Rhee intento tambien ocultar su verdadera naturaleza de provocador de guerra al tomar unas medidas enganosas en visperas de la guerra como la cancelacion de la ley marcial de emergencia, el permiso de salir y pasar la noche fuera del ejercito titere, los banquetes, etc.
					
					 Para emitir la orden de iniciar la guerra luego de inspeccionar y verificar en el terreno los preparativos de la guerra contra el Norte, el presidente de EE.UU. Truman envio al secretario de Defensa Johnson y al presidente de la Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor Bradley a la comandancia de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Extremo Oriente  en Tokio, y al asesor de Departamento de Estado Dulles al Sur de Corea como su enviado especial. La visita a Seul de Dulles fue la senal de inicio de ataque y sirvio para garantizar en el nivel supremo a Syngman Rhee el apoyo de las fuerzas navales y aereas norteamericanas. (Pagina 99 del primer tomo del libro estadounidense "Historia de la Guerra Coreana", version japonesa)
					
					 En definitiva, fue emitida la orden secreta de provocar la guerra al ejercito titere surcoreano de Syngman Rhee, la cual fue examinada en el terreno por Dulles y firmada finalmente por Truman.
					
					 El jefe del Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano Chae Pyong Dok emitio el 21 de junio de 1950 a las comandancias de combate 1 y 2 la orden consistente en iniciar a la madrugada del dia 25 el ataque contra la RPDC.
					
					 Segun ella, el ejercito surcoreano inicio a las 4 de la madrugada del 25 de junio la invasion armada sorpresiva contra la RPDC a lo largo de todo el paralelo norte 38o bajo el mando de los asesores militares norteamericanos.
					
					 EE.UU. abuso de la ONU para ocultar su verdadera naturaleza de provocador de guerra y agresor,  imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad del estallido de la guerra coreana y ampliar la invasion armada.
					
					 Por el maquiavelismo y la demanda de gangster de EE.UU., sesiono el 25 de junio de 1950  la reunion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en que se aprobo la "resolucion" invirtiendo la agresion al Norte (de Corea) como la "invasion al Sur".
					
					 Este imperio intento "justificar" su agresion inventando las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					 2-3 horas despues de la declaracion de Truman de que las tropas norteamericanas entraron en el combate, la ONU aprobo la "resolucion" que exhortaba a todos los paises miembros a brindar asistencia al Sur de Corea. (periodico norteamericano "Mineapolice Times", 23 de julio de 1950)
					
					 La historia ya ha evaluado correctamente lo injusto de esas "resoluciones".
					
					 Desde aqui, seran mencionadas las maniobras de EE.UU. tendentes a tergiversar la verdad del estallido de la guerra coreana.
					
					Cada vez que tenian la oportunidad, los imperialistas yanquis inculcaban en la camarilla del titere Syngman Rhee la "necesidad de hacer reconocer al mundo que el Sur de Corea fue atacado primero", al tiempo que libraban la propaganda falsa de la "expedicion armada al Sur". (libro estadounidense "Guerra coreana; pregunta sin respuesta" 44-45 paginas)
					
					  Igualmente, actuaron astutamente por falsificar el estallido de la guerra coreana como "ataque sorpresivo del Norte" y "evento inesperado".
					
					  Un ejemplo de ello, fue el "primer parte" que envio el embajador norteamericano acreditado en el Sur de Corea, Muccio, al Departamento de Estado estadounidense el 25 de junio de 1950.
					
					  Pero, ellos mismos y sus lacayos reconocieron que la guerra coreana fue desatada no por el Norte sino por el Sur.
					
					  La guerra coreana provino practicamente de la provocacion del Sur. (despacho de "Kyodo" del 25 de junio de 1975)
					
					MacArthur, quien jugo el papel protagonico en desatar la guerra coreana, confeso que "esta guerra fue su plan".
					
					Al revelarse plenamente la verdad de provocacion de la guerra coreana mediante el documento secreto que ha confiscado el Ejercito Popular de Corea liberando a Seul en el curso de guerra, los imperialistas yanquis se mantuvieron callados por un buen rato. Pero, en mayo de 1951, presentaron un documento falsificado para "probar" la "agresion al Sur del 25 de junio" y tergiversar la verdad del estallido de guerra.
					
					  Aun en el periodo posbelico, para liberarse de la responsabilidad de haber desatado la guerra coreana, continuaron con la tergiversacion usando los metodos ya referidos y proponiendo la "reevaluacion" mediante el "desciframiento de secretos" en virtud de la "ley de informacion libre" y la "evaluacion conjunta de ambas partes beligerantes" en aprovechamiento de la politica de apertura de Europa oriental.
					
					  Finalizada la guerra fria, intentaron suprimir la verdad del estallido de la guerra asumiendo la posicion impositiva segun la "filosofia" norteamericana.
					
					  Esta conducta de los imperialistas yanquis y sus lacayos parte del objetivo de provocar otra vez la guerra coreana para dominar el mundo entero perpetuando la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano.
					
					  Aunque los imperialistas yanquis recurren a toda forma de tejemanejes para distorsionar la verdad de la provocacion de guerra coreana, no podran ocultar jamas su fachada de provocador y agresor.

articles.title: Politico polaco demanda a EE.UU. concertar convenio de paz con RPDC
articles.content:
Politico polaco demanda a EE.UU. concertar convenio de paz con RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del mes de lucha comun antiyanqui 25 de junio-27 de julio, el presidente del Comite Ejecutivo Nacional del Partido Comunista de Polonia, Jozef Wacht, hizo publica el dia 18 una declaracion.
					  La nota recuerda que el pueblo coreano defendio la soberania y la dignidad del pais en la guerra y EE.UU. se vio obligado a firmar el Acuerdo de Armisticio con la joven Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Despues de ser firmado este acuerdo, la RPDC presento varias veces a EE.UU. la propuesta de sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por un convenio de la paz duradera, acelerando la construccion economica pacifica, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					  Pero, el imperio y sus lacayunas, las autoridades surcoreanas, respondieron al respecto con las maquinaciones de provocacion de nueva guerra.
					
					  Aunque transcurrio mucho tiempo desde cuando se puso fin a la guerra fria, sigue siendo el estado de armisticio durante mas de medio siglo y no desaparece el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Hoy tambien EE.UU. practica invariablemente la politica de amenaza nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					  Si EE.UU. desea de veras la paz y la coprosperidad, debe discutir sinceramente los problemas presentados con la RPDC y concertar el convenio de paz con esta.
					
					  La justeza de la linea y politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que goza de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il se manifestara una vez mas evidentemente en la labor para lograr la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Iniciado en Cuba mes de solidaridad internacional con el pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Iniciado en Cuba mes de solidaridad internacional con el pueblo coreano 
						
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ATCC) --  Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en Cuba el acto inaugural del mes de solidaridad internacional con el pueblo coreano.
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba, el Instituto Cubano de Amistad con los Pueblos, el Comite Cubano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea y el Comite de Defensa de la Revolucion y otros habitantes cubanos.
					
					Fueron invitados el embajador y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en el pais caribeno.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					El primer vicepresidente del Comite Cubano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea, Juan Jose Leon Vega, menciono que bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea lograron fulminante victoria en la trienal Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria venciendo a los imperialistas norteamericanos. 
					
					Prosiguio que en vez de aprender la leccion de su amarga derrota en la guerra coreana, EE.UU. tiene emplazadas todavia en el Sur de Corea colosales fuerzas agresoras y acecha la oportunidad para agredir de nuevo a la RPDC usando los sofisticados equipos militares de toda indole.
					
					Subrayo que en acato al legado del Presidente, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il conduce sabiamente la lucha del pueblo coreano por la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria frustrando paso a paso las maniobras agresivas de los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus lacayos.
					
					Se refirio a que en estos tiempos, los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas surcoreanos llevan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de la guerra tras inventar el incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" y afirmo que ellos nunca podran doblegar al pueblo coreano. 
					
					Concluyo manifestando la voluntad de su comite de apoyar activamente en el futuro tambien la lucha heroica del pueblo coreano.
